intro: Bikkia philippinensis, commonly known as the Philippine bikkia, is a flowering plant native to the Philippines. It belongs to the family Violaceae and is characterized by its small, delicate flowers that are typically pink or purple in color. The plant grows in shaded, moist environments such as forest understories and rocky areas. It has lance-shaped leaves and produces capsule fruits that contain numerous seeds. Bikkia philippinensis is of interest to botanists due to its limited distribution and unique ecological adaptations.
